text: List of miscellaneous ships of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary is a list of miscellaneous vessel types operated by the British Royal Fleet Auxiliary. ==Active== *Helicopter Support Ship ** ==Decommissioned== *Forward Repair Ship ** *Helicopter Support Ships ** ** *Salvage Vessels *King Salvor classsome operated under Red Ensign during Second World War ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ** ** *Hospital Ships ** ** ** ** ** ==Notes and references== United Kingdom Miscellaneous Miscellaneous
title: List of miscellaneous ships of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary
